A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Take the hero of one of the greatest movie franchises of all time. Make him a failure\, a coward\, and ultimately a diversionary tactic. Add in a heavy handed feminist critique of all male authority and virtue. What do you get? Why\, the new Star Wars movie...\nKathleen Kennedy's insistence that \"the Force is Female\" has pulled something transcendent into the gutters of gender politics. No ma'am\, \"the force is forever\, for all generations\,\" genders\, and races.
